Fri, 21 Mar 2025 05:53:22 +0000 Auckland resident Selica Wright has pleaded guilty to the months-long torture of an youth that included repeatedly hitting him with a hammer, pouring boiling water over him and stabbing him with a chef's knife and a screwdriver.
